ARABIC: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلْقُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa said to them, 'Throw whatever it is you are going to throw!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses said to them: "Cast what you have to cast."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said to them: "Throw down whatever you wish to throw."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Moses) asked the magicians, "Cast down what you want to".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Moosa said to them, “Cast whatever you intend to cast.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Musa said to them: "Throw what you are going to throw!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Musa said to them: Cast what you are going to cast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Moses said to them, 'Cast you down what you will cast.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Moses said unto them: Throw what ye are going to throw!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said to the magicians, "Throw down whatever you are going to throw."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Musa said unto them: cast whatsoever ye have to cast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Moses said to them, ‘Throw down whatever you have to throw!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Moses said to them: "Throw ye - that which ye are about to throw!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Musa (Moses) said to them: "Throw what you are going to throw!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses said to them: 'Cast down what you cast'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Moses said to them, “Present what you intend to present.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:43] Moses said to them, after they had said to him, Either you cast, or we shall be the casters [Q. 7:115]: ‘Cast what you have to cast’ — the command to do this signifies an authorisation for them to cast and a means whereby the truth will be made to prevail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Moses said unto them) he said to the wizards: (Throw what ye are going to throw!
